{!Contact.SchoolText__c} Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
1st December 2014
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
At BSKL, we offer a diverse programme of individual instrumental lessons to children from Year 2 upwards. Instrumental lessons currently on offer are: Piano – starting from YR2 Violin – starting from YR2 Flute – starting from YR5 Clarinet – starting from YR5 Saxophone – starting from YR5 Brass (Trumpet, Tenor Horn, Baritone, Euphonium or Trombone) – starting YR5 Guitar (NEW) - starting from YR3
Individual lessons are rotated around the school timetable and offered once a week, at a cost of RM75 per lesson. There are normally ten confirmed lessons during term time, each lasting 45 minutes. Lessons begin in the second week of each term and follow through, in most cases, to the penultimate week.
For first-time applications or to re-register your child for their lessons, please follow the steps below.
Step 1: Please follow the link to read more about the programme http://music.britishschool.edu.my/individual/
Step 2: Submit the online application form which can be found here. https://docs.google.com/a/britishschool.edu.my/forms/d/16T523jSU9tp3hu0SHDe97a6vnSSjP7PimoNWUI5Jlm4/viewform
NB: Please ensure that you have read and agree to the terms and conditions attached at the end of the form before submitting the form.
Once your application has been received, confirmation of your request is immediately effective. You will receive a link to your child’s timetable by the end of the first week of term 2.
The closing date for applications is Friday 12th December.
Many thanks
The Music Department
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} World Class Education
